snippet.title: GRID Legends | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Prepare to tear up the rulebook of racing and dive head first into the exciting world of motorsport drama. This is edge of your seat racing. This is seamless cross-platform multiplayer. This is GRID Legends – created for the racing thrill-seekers.
 
#GRIDLegends is OUT NOW on PlayStation, Xbox, Steam, and Origin! Pre-order to receive exclusive add-ons, including extra cars. The Deluxe Edition of GRID Legends also out now and includes even more bonus content and four huge post-launch expansions.

Order now: www.ea.com/games/grid/grid-legends/buy
Full details: www.ea.com/games/grid/grid-legends/news/launch-date-editions-content

🐦 Twitter | https://twitter.com/gridgame 
📖 Facebook | https://www.facebook.com/gridgame 
📸 Instagram | https://www.instagram.com/gridgame

#Crossplay #StoryMode
